title: Pogo Stick
summaries: The Pogo Stick is a mount sold by the Party Girl for 25. Jumping again while in the air causes the player to do a front-flip. It doubles the speed at which the player falls, but does not grant immunity to fall damage. It has a max speed of 28 mph. It also has a certain amount of momentum while airborne, meaning it continues travelling in the last horizontal direction the player inputted whist in the air, rather than slowing.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a rideable pogo stick mount
Press Jump again in mid-air to do tricks!
statistics.Buy: 25
statistics.Sell: 5
